titles: A tender visitation of the Fathers love, to all the elect-children, or, An epistle unto the righteous congregations who in the light are gathered, and are worshippers of the Father in spirit and truth, to be read amongst them in the pure fear of the Lord God, when they are assembled and met together in his name / by Wlliam Smith.
author: Smith, William, d. 1673.
publisher: Printed, and are sold by Robert Wilson ...,
notes: Reproduction of original in Duke University Library.
keywords: Society of Friends --  Great Britain --  Doctrines.
